summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Alexa N. Staley, and Jes Staley discussing a summer school program on gravitational wave astronomy. Jes Staley suggests that Alexa should send details about the program to Jeffrey Epstein for his opinion on its value.
